text: Shirala Mallick is a Pakistani Politician and a Member of Senate of Pakistan. ==Political career== In March 2009, she was elected to the Senate of Pakistan on reserved seat for Women as MQM candidate. She is member of Senate committee of Information Technology and Telecommunication, Information, Broadcasting and National Heritage, Housing and Works Planning Development and Reform . ==See also== * List of Senators of Pakistan * Abdul Haseeb Khan * Hafiz Hamdullah ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Senate of Pakistan Category:Muttahida Qaumi Movement politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shirala Mallick
